response.overview: Alex recently got into his new family. And now, for the first time in his life, he saw the sea. He longs for his native family, and it is still too hard for him to accept the reality in which his native family is not around. Living in two realities at the same time is not easy...Alex has become inattentive, studies poorly, can't make friends with anyone, and parents have to repeat their requests 3 times. Everyone needs their own approach. And especially for children with a difficult history.
response.title: Alex's Story
